body_html: It's probably because when you use repr on a string it converts non-printable/non-ascii/not-visible characters (like newlines) into literals, so you can reconstruct the string by pasting the result into the interpreter.
body_text: It's probably because when you use repr on a string it converts non-printable/non-ascii/not-visible characters (like newlines) into literals, so you can reconstruct the string by pasting the result into the interpreter.
body: It's probably because when you use `repr` on a string it converts non-printable/non-ascii/not-visible characters (like newlines) into literals, so you can reconstruct the string by pasting the result into the interpreter.
